author: Lawrence Richard
title: NYC politician pulls funding from Jewish museum over alleged DeSantis snub

sentence: After months of planning, New York Citys Museum of Jewish Heritage was just weeks away from hosting the Tikvah Funds Jewish Leadership Conference when it learned that Florida governor Ron DeSantis was among the speakers.

title: When Inclusivity Is Code for Intolerance
